name: Lead Storm
description:
This game was made for the Intelevision Jam #2.

Stranded on the shores of the enemy island, you pick up your trusty machine gun and go on a rampage to find an escape from this deathtrap.

Will you succeed ?

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys for movement
Space - firing weapon
Enter - toggling the CRT effect
P- PAUSE GAME
ESC - EXIT GAME

SPECIAL GODMODE

For double speed, invicible mode: hold control and press G.
Godmode disables score.
